//http://www.codechef.com/problems/COD04
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
	int t,i; 
	while(scanf("%d",&t)!=EOF)
	{
		if(t==0) printf("1\n");
		else if(t==1) printf("0\n");
		else if(t==2) printf("8\n");
		else
		{
			while(t>0)
			{
				if(t%2!=0) 
				{
					printf("4"); t-=1;
				}
				else 
				{
					printf("8");t-=2;
				}
			}
		}
		printf("\n");
	} 
	
	return 0;
}
